title: Looking for a grown up Halloween party? We have an event just for you!
text:
Looking for a grown up Halloween party? We have an event just for you! Halloween is about a week away, and it's not just for the kids. Post to Facebook Looking for a grown up Halloween party? We have an event just for you! Halloween is about a week away, and it's not just for the kids.  //on.kthv.com/1LOmCMP   Join the Conversation To   Looking for a grown up Halloween party? We have an event just for you! THV11 Staff, news source 7:30 a.m. CDT October 22, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Halloween is about a week away, and it's not just for the kids. --THV11.com 10/22/15 
LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (KTV) - Halloween is about a week away, and it's not just for the kids. 
The Castle on Stagecoach is hosting a Halloween Costume Party for grownups Sat., Oct. 31 from 7 p.m. to 11 p.m. A dinner buffet and adult beverages will be served and prizes will be awarded. 
Tickets must be purchased in advance and are $55 per person. Call (501) 960-0658 for details. 
To catch one of the nightâ€™s scheduled performances in the video attached to this story. 
Get more information at The Castle on Stagecoach Facebook page: http://on.kthv.com/1Rqd6iI
